title: Average U.S. brand response rate on social media 2017 , by vertical
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average response rate in the y axis.
The maximum Average response rate 18.0 is found at Month Utilities and the minimum is found at Media/Entertainment where Month is 6.0.
The difference of Average response rate between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
The Average response rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Utilities and lowest at Month Media/Entertainment.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Average response rate in the y axis.
The maximum Average response rate 18.0 is found at Month Utilities and the minimum is found at Media/Entertainment where Month is 6.0.
The difference of Average response rate between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Average response rate for 15 number of Months.
The Average response rate is highest at Month Utilities and lowest at Month Media/Entertainment.
The difference of Average response rate between the highest and lowest Month is 12.0.
The Month Utilities has the highest Average response rate, followed by Retail, and Consumer Goods. Down to the Month Media/Entertainment which is the lowest.
Overall Average response rate has lowered over the Months.
Month Internet/Technology, Marketing/Advertising, and Automotive have the same Average response rate.
The Month Media/Entertainment tends to be 1.67 percent lower than average.
The Average response rate is 162.0 if we add up values of all Months.
